Articles.Content:
Have you guys seen the new video Space-X put up on YouTube? They totally give a shout-out to KSP!

Here is the video, shout out happens at around 2:03, don't know if there are any others as I haven't finished the video yet lol.

[https://youtu.be/txk-VO1hzBY](https://youtu.be/txk-VO1hzBY)

PS. no idea how to embed youtube videos on the forums

**Edit:** Ok so Space-X wasn't who posted it but it is a video of a Space-X presentation where they mention KSP, oh and it is actually a pretty awesome video about engine design and simulation using GPUs

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-30T02:58:51Z" title="05/30/2015 02:58  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 30, 2015</time> by Akira\_R**
